rawFeedback:
This mock interview was an exercise in inefficiency. For a Director-level role at Tesla, the assessment must be rigorous, broad, and challenging. This session was none of those things. The system got stuck in a repetitive loop, failing to recognize the strategic depth of my answers and insisting on re-litigating the same risk factor. This wasted my time and demonstrated a fundamental lack of sophistication in the response analysis module.

Furthermore, terminating the interview after 62 seconds is unacceptable. It suggests the system is either unstable or fundamentally incapable of running a proper executive assessment. If this tool is meant to prepare candidates for high-stakes roles, it must simulate a full, challenging conversation that covers multiple strategic pillars, not just one narrow risk area.

I expect immediate correction on the flow and termination logic. The content needs to be sharper and the interviewer needs to challenge the *viability* of the proposed solutions, not just restate the initial problem. Currently, I cannot recommend this tool for executive preparation.
